languages.text: Но тут и там в секторе вспухали язвы жестокости, нетерпимости и злоупотребления, которые могло исцелить лишь беспрерывное вмешательство Вольного Торговца.
Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.
languages.original_text: Но тут и там в секторе вспухали язвы жестокости, нетерпимости и злоупотребления, которые могло исцелить лишь беспрерывное вмешательство Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Yet ulcers of cruelty, intolerance, and corruption were opening all over the sector. Only constant direct involvement of Rogue Trader could heal them.
Yet ulcers of cruelty, intolerance, and corruption were opening all over the sector. Only constant direct involvement of Rogue Trader could heal them.
Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption were steadily growing throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep them at bay.
Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption were steadily growing throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep them at bay.
Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.
Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

languages.text: 然而，残酷、狭隘和腐化像脓疮一样，在整个扩区中肆意蔓延，只有行商浪人的不断监督才能遏制这些邪恶的力量。
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: 然而，残酷、狭隘和腐化在整个扩区中肆意蔓延，只有行商浪人的不断监督才能遏制这些邪恶的力量。

languages.text: Doch Grausamkeit, Intoleranz und Verderbnis wuchsen im gesamten Sektor wie schwelende Wunden. Nur die ständige Wachsamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} konnte die Pestilenz im Zaum halten.
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: Doch Grausamkeit, Intoleranz und Verderbnis wuchsen im gesamten Sektor. Nur die ständige Wachsamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} konnte sie im Zaum halten.

languages.text: Cependant, la cruauté, l'intolérance et la corruption continuaient à gangrener tout le secteur. Seule la surveillance constante {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pouvait tenir la pestilence en respect.
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, la cruauté, l'intolérance et la corruption continuaient à croître dans le secteur. Seule la surveillance constante {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pouvait tenir les dissidents en respect.

languages.text: Sin embargo, la crueldad, la intolerancia y la corrupción se extendieron como la peste por todo el sector. Solo la vigilancia constante de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente las mantenía a raya.
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, la crueldad, la intolerancia y la corrupción no hicieron más que aumentar por todo el sector. Solo la vigilancia constante de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente las mantenía a raya.

languages.text: しかし、残酷さ、不寛容さ、腐敗は、化膿した傷のように星域全体へと拡大していた。自由開拓者の絶え間ない監視だけが、腐敗を抑えることができた。
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: しかし、残酷さ、不寛容さ、腐敗は、化膿した傷のように星域全体へと拡大していた。自由開拓者の絶え間ない監視だけが、腐敗を抑えることができた。

languages.text: Ancak zalimlik, hoşgörüsüzlük ve yozlaşma; kapanmayan bir yaradan akan kan misali sektörün her yanını kaplamıştı. Bu hastalığı uzak tutabilecek tek şey, Hür Tacir'in devamlı gözetimiydi.
languages.original_text: Yet cruelty, intolerance, and corruption grew like festering sores throughout the sector. Only the Rogue Trader's constant oversight could keep the pestilence at bay.

traits.locale_text: Ancak zalimlik, hoşgörüsüzlük ve yozlaşma, kapanmayan bir yaradan akan kanlar misali sektörün her yanını kaplamıştı. Bu hastalığı uzak tutabilecek tek şey, Hür Tacir'in devamlı gözetimiydi.
